text: @realDonaldTrump Ask the families of the 130,000+ dead from COVID-19 how SAFE they feel. Or the American soldiers you allowed Putin to put a bounty on. Or the peaceful protesters you had teargassed for a grotesque photo op. Or the immigrant children locked up in cages. SAFE?#TrumpFailedAmerica
